name: Village Vampire Feast
description:
A 2018 update of a game I made in 2012.

You're the new vampire in town! To stay alive (or undead, rather), feast on the villagers.

Find villagers wandering alone for safe feasting. Or raise a vampire army to wage war against the police who are gunning for you! Last as long as you can!

Features the track "Disco Is Undead" by FoxSynergy.
